sentences.sentence: I spent my boyhood climbing trees on Streatham Common, South London.
sentences.translation: 我的童年是在伦敦南部的斯特里塔姆公园爬树度过的。

sentences.sentence: My boyhood hero was Kit Carson.
sentences.translation: 我孩提时的偶像是基特·卡森。

sentences.sentence: They are rivals who have known each other since boyhood.
sentences.translation: 他们是少年时代就相识的对手。
